string.name: terms_privacy
string.font: Terms and Privacy

string.name: help_and_faq
string.font: Help and FAQ

string.name: log_out
string.font: Log Out

string.name: terms_privacy_welcome_note
string.font: Welcome to SunnZaraa Music App ! By using our app, you agree to the following terms and conditions. Please read them carefully.

string.name: acceptance_of_terms
string.font: 1. Acceptance of Terms

string.name: acceptance_of_terms_content
string.font: By accessing or using SunnZaraa Music App, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms and Policies. If you do not agree, please do not use the app.

string.name: use_of_app
string.font: 2. Use of the App

string.name: use_of_app_content_1
string.font: - You must be at least 14 years old to use this app.

string.name: use_of_app_content_2
string.font: - The app is for personal, non-commercial use only.

string.name: use_of_app_content_3
string.font: - Do not engage in any activity that may harm the app, its users, or its content.

string.name: account_information
string.font: 3. Account Information

string.name: account_information_content_1
string.font: - You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials.

string.name: account_information_content_2
string.font: - Ensure the information you provide is accurate and up-to-date.

string.name: content_and_copyright
string.font: 4. Content and Copyright

string.name: content_and_copyright_content_1
string.font: - All music, graphics, and content in the app are the property of SunnZaraa Music App or their respective owners.

string.name: content_and_copyright_content_2
string.font: - Do not copy, distribute, or modify the app’s content without prior permission.

string.name: privacy_policy
string.font: 5. Privacy Policy

string.name: privacy_policy_content_1
string.font: - We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your data. Any personal information you provide will be handled in accordance with our Privacy Policy.

string.name: privacy_policy_content_2
string.font: - The app may collect data such as usage patterns and preferences to enhance user experience.

string.name: subscriptions_and_payments
string.font: 6. Subscriptions and Payments

string.name: subscriptions_and_payments_content_1
string.font: - If the app offers premium features, they are available on a subscription basis. Ensure timely payment to avoid interruptions.

string.name: subscriptions_and_payments_content_2
string.font: - Subscription details and pricing are clearly outlined within the app.

string.name: third_party_links
string.font: 7. Third Party Links

string.name: third_party_links_content
string.font: The app may include links to third-party websites or services. We are not responsible for their content, privacy policies, or practices.

string.name: termination_of_use
string.font: 8. Termination of Use

string.name: termination_of_use_content
string.font: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your access to the app if you violate these terms.

string.name: limitation_of_liability
string.font: 9. Limitation of Liability

string.name: limitation_of_liability_content_1
string.font: We are not responsible for:

string.name: limitation_of_liability_content_2
string.font: - Any interruptions or errors in the app.

string.name: limitation_of_liability_content_3
string.font: - Loss of data or damage caused by using the app.

string.name: changes_to_terms
string.font: 10. Changes to Terms

string.name: changes_to_terms_content
string.font: We may update these Terms and Policies from time to time. Continued use of the app indicates acceptance of the updated terms.

string.name: support_mail_note
string.font: For any questions or concerns, please contact us at sunnzaraa@gmail.com.

string.name: thankyou_note
string.font: Thank you for choosing SunnZaraa!

string.name: what_is_sunnzaraa
string.font: What is SunnZaraa?

string.name: what_is_sunnzaraa_answer
string.font: SunnZaraa is a music app that allows you to stream, download, and enjoy your favorite tracks anytime, anywhere.

string.name: how_to_search
string.font: How do I search for a song or artist?

string.name: how_to_search_answer
string.font: Use the search icon at the bottom of the app. Type in the name of the song, album, or artist.

string.name: how_to_add_favourites
string.font: How do I add songs to my favorites?

string.name: how_to_add_favourites_answer
string.font: Tap the heart icon next to a song to add it to your favorites. You can access your favorite songs in the "Favorites" section.

string.name: how_to_create_playlist
string.font: How do I create a playlist?

string.name: how_to_create_playlist_answer
string.font: Navigate to the "Library" section, tap "Create Playlist," name your playlist, and start adding songs by tapping the "+" button next to your favorite tracks.

string.name: will_i_lose_data_on_uninstallation
string.font: Will my data be lost if I uninstall the app?

string.name: will_i_lose_data_on_uninstallation_answer
string.font: es, since data is stored locally, uninstalling the app will delete all your playlists and saved preferences.

string.name: why_cant_play_songs
string.font: Why can’t I play certain songs?

string.name: why_cant_play_songs_answer
string.font: Some songs may not be available due to licensing restrictions. We are always working to expand our library.

string.name: how_to_report_bug_query
string.font: How do I report a bug or provide feedback?

string.name: how_to_report_bug_query_answer
string.font: Please refer to the email provided in the Terms and Policy section and feel free to mail us. We’re here to assist you!
